summary: I am a full-stack software engineer with over 15 years experience in agile software development. My bread and butter are the Microsoft Tech stack and the Angular ecosystem. I am deeply committed to producing quality code and advocating for industry best practices. I place the utmost importance on collaboration, communication, and documentation.

highlights: Developed and enhanced SaaS web applications facilitating Pay-As-You-Go functionality for worker's compensation insurance.
Implemented Single Sign-on with OpenID Connect and NgRx data storage within our Angular application.
Refactored our software offerings to meet modern best practices and design principals.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams and participated in the entire SLDC, including engineering approval and estimation, implementation, code reviews, CI/CD, documentation, release management
Developed and enhanced N-Tiered web applications facilitating clinical nutrition and inventory management
Practiced pair programming within a remote development team
Participated in Agile ceremonies such as planning, estimation, demos, retrospectives
Spearheaded development of a multiplatform mobile application created using Ionic Framework
Configured CI/CD in AWS, utilizing CodeBuild, CodePipeline, CloudFront, and CloudFormation.
Developed highly configurable desktop and web software offerings serving the resource management industry
Implemented custom work requests in Windows forms, ASP.NET, and Crystal/Active Reports
Developed a Silverlight web application facilitating the monitoring of unpowered assets for the rail industry.
Architected systems for message transfer, event brokerage, and data display.
Created an engine for auditing freight car maintence billing records.
I created, maintained, and enhanced ASP.Net web applications for the nuclear industry, focusing on equipment reliability and access authorization.
